programme.title: Space Channel Universe- all around our social space.
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : The Apollo Sale
programme.desc: Torie’s son Jason joins her on the road – she’s introducing him to the family business but will he be more hindrance than help? Larry turns ‘gastronaut’ when he comes across some space food; and a collector’s flash sale sees Cole bid for an Apollo 11 item with an incredible story – how Buzz Aldrin took Holy Communion on the moon. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Best of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel selects the our favorite Cinespace movies Duration: 7200

programme.title: Planets with David Becker
programme.desc: For more than three decades, Grammy and Emmy nominated guitarist, composer, producer David Becker has continued to define himself as one of the best and most unique voices in jazz and contemporary music by combining diverse influences and a passion for the new and different, and his ability to play for the present while always keeping an eye on the past and future. He has led the critically acclaimed DAVID BECKER TRIBUNE to a worldwide audience by performing in more than 35 countries. Duration: 3600

programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: From commercial space stations to water on the Moon, there's a lot happening in space and we follow the stories that have real meaning on the ground. Duration: 2980

programme.title: New Lunar Rovers
programme.desc: Saudi Arabia and Russia begin training astronauts, 3D printed rocket parts are now becoming reality, and General Motors and Lockheed Martin have just partnered to create an Artemis era Lunar Rover. Duration: 240

programme.title: New Space Race - Asia update
programme.desc: While the commercialization of space begins to flourish, the militarization of LEO and beyond is accelerating exponentially. Multiple Asian countries are now strengthening their presence in space. Duration: 294

programme.title: Latest News - China Starlink update
programme.desc: As commercial and government space programs continue to overlap, China seems particularly worried about SpaceX. According to China Military Online, an official website linked to China’s Central Military Commission, Elon Musk’s SpaceX might be used by the “hegemony-obsessed US” to dominate space and bring “chaos or calamity” to the world. Duration: 271

programme.title: Space Channel News Special-Space Force Automation Spectrum
programme.desc: Aaron's research deals with human decision making when paired with Artificial Intelligence, autonomous systems, or other types of artificial systems. Specifically, research questions revolve around advisor trust using human confidence as an implicit measure of advisor trust when receiving advice or working in a human-machine team. In other words, my research aims to uncover methods to maximize appropriate human-machine interaction. Other areas of interest include the effects of anthropomorphism, algorithmic expressions of confidence, user cognitive load, user affective states, and other dispositional traits of the user on human advice seeking and use. Duration: 1800

programme.desc: Aaron's research deals with human decision making when paired with Artificial Intelligence, autonomous systems, or other types of artificial systems. programme.title: ASAT Chinese AI update
programme.desc: Kamala Harris announced that the United States will stop conducting anti-satellite tests. Anti-satellite (or ASAT) tests are exercises using ground-based missiles to eliminate satellite crafts orbiting the earth. China is reportedly working on an AI-based espionage network utilizing satellites already orbiting the earth. Duration: 210

programme.title: War Space - China vs USA in space
programme.desc: That tensions are heating up is evident from Russia’s anti-satellite test in November, its first debris-creating test since the Cold War. Here at Space Channel, we’ve been wondering, how would a war in space actually happen? Duration: 390
